casebody.data:
Noel CHANCE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 24, 2018

Kinga A. Kostaniak, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Sarah Hanna, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Noel Chance's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate *1197Court, 184 Conn. App. 524, 195 A.3d 422 (2018), is denied.
